title: Tony Little Pillow by Homedics - Micropedic Therapy Pillow
transcripts:
Tony Little Micropedic Therapy Pillow by Homedics

The Tony Little Pillow provides the latest revolution in sleep therapy. It features an exclusive patented quad chamber pillow design that never needs  Tony Little Micropedic Therapy Pillowfluffing and retains its natural shape. The millions of air infused micropedic beads cradle any part of your body and allow air circulation, while the luxurious Spandex liner stretches and molds with your every movement. Includes bonus pillowcase. Cover is 85% polyester/15% Spandex with a 100% polystyrene foam beads. Measures 15" W x 22" L. Machine wash. Imported.

Are you tired of tossing and turning?  Do you wakeup with a sore neck?  Does your pillow get hot?  What would you give for a perfect nights sleep?

Americas Personal Trainer and Fitness Hall of Famer, Tony Little, has teamed up with HoMedics® to create the worlds greatest sleep pillow: the Micropedic Therapy Pillow.

Whats Tony Littles perfect sleep secret?  HoMedics fills the Micropedic pillow with over 60 million air-infused Micropedic beads, enveloping your head in comfort, and cradling your neck and spine.

This isnt just an ordinary pillow.  This is breakthrough Micropedic sleep technology.  This is the worlds greatest sleep pillow.

The first night you use this pillow, you will fall in love with it.  It supports your head.  It supports your neck.  And gives you the best nights sleep you ever had.  This pillow moves when you move.  Its patented quad chamber design is self-fluffing, supporting your head and neck, your hips, and even your knees in any position.  And it never gets hot.  The air just goes right through it.  It stays extremely cool.  Unlike regular cotton pillowcases, the air flows freely through our never-get-hot pillowcase.  I bought another one for my wife because she kept taking mine.  No matter how you sleep, on your back, on your side, or on your stomach, the Tony Little Micropedic Therapy Pillow adjusts to your body.

Watch Tony demonstrate how other pillow materials cant compete with the cradling action and support of the Micropedic beads used in this amazing pillow.

Try the Tony Little Micropedic Therapy Pillow by HoMedics tonight.
